name: Pterodactyl
description: Another animated dinosaur game sprite for the collection. With the included files yuo should find all you need to easily incorperate this game asset into you game development project. The download includes hd spritesheets , png body pars and a fully rigged spriter file puppet. with the spriter file you can export upto sixty percent higher resolution without losing image quality. You can also use the apriter file to export keyframes.
